Instruction: Combine the flour and sugar in a large bowl, sifting them together and setting aside.
Combine and heat in a saucepan over medium heat: 1/2 cup butter or margarine, 1/2 cup shortening, 1 cup water, and 4 tablespoons cocoa until boiling.
Combine the flour and sugar mixture with the cocoa mixture. Add buttermilk, eggs, baking soda, and vanilla. Mix thoroughly and transfer the batter into a greased and floured sheet pan.
Bake in a oven preheated to 400 degrees F (205 degrees C) for 20 minutes.

Prepare frosting: In a saucepan, boil together 1/2 cup margarine or butter, 6 tablespoons milk, and 4 tablespoons cocoa. Remove from heat and blend in confectioners' sugar, nuts (optional), and 1/2 teaspoon vanilla. Beat until smooth and promptly pour over warm cake. Serve warm or at room temperature.
